caption: The video opens with an intense chase sequence. A family of five, in a blue sedan, speeds through a litter-strewn parking lot. Hot on their tail is a man in pink clothing, driving a red car. After a thrilling chase, the man in pink eventually catches up to the family, using his car to push their vehicle into a large pit. Seemingly intent on burying them alive, he proceeds to shovel dirt onto their car, burying it. However, by the end of the video, the family is still alive inside the vehicle, and they begin to discuss possible escape plans.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.
